item.title: Drain is almost to top with stinky, putrid water., 25th April
item.description:
Outside 140 Fairview Rd. I have reported this drain previously and the problem has not been addressed. It reeks. It's full almost to road level and there's a horrid bubbling scum on the top of the water. When it rains, the drain floods. It NEEDS cleaning out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
